text: Bibian Mentel-Spee (27 September 1972 â€“ 29 March 2021) was a Dutch three-time Winter Paralympics gold-medalist. Mentel won the Paralympic gold medal in the snowboard cross discipline in the 2014 and 2018 Paralympic Winter Games, as well as in the banked slalom in 2018. On 5 March 2021, it was announced that she had been diagnosed with terminal brain cancer. Mentel died on 29 March 2021 from the disease, aged 48.Bibian Mentel (48), drievoudig paralympisch kampioene snowboarden, overleden , NOS, Dutch, published 29 March 2021 ==Notes== ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the Netherlands Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Deaths from brain cancer
title: Bibian Mentel
